  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_91204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_91204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Lumière et ombre</string>
            <string language="en">Light and shadow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht und Schatten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz e sombra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce ed ombra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως και σκιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Luz y sombra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre deux propriétés de la lumière (réflexion et propagation en ligne droite)qui résultent dans la vision et la formation d'ombre. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un exercice où il faudrait ajouter une légende.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two properties of light (reflection and straight line propagation) that results into vision and shadow formation.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">écran de lampe</string>
            <string language="en">lamp. screen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">propagation rectiligne</string>
            <string language="en">rectilinear propagation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombre</string>
            <string language="en">shadow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vision</string>
            <string language="en">vision</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Eigenschaften Licht 
(Reflexion und gerade Gerade Ausbreitung) diesen Resultate in Anblick 
und in Schattenanordnung. Dieses kann in einer beschriftenden 
Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a duas propriedades da luz 
(reflexão e linha reta propagação) essas resultados na visão e na 
formação da sombra. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício 
etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra a due proprietà di luce 
(riflessione e linea retta propagazione) quelle i risultati nella 
visione e nella formazione dell'ombra. Ciò può essere usata in
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο ιδιότητες του φωτός 
(αντανάκλαση και διάδοση ευθειών γραμμών) που οδηγεί στο όραμα 
και το σχηματισμό σκιών. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε 
μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra a dos características de 
luz (reflexión y línea recta propagación) esas resultados en la 
visión y la formación de la sombra. Esto se puede utilizar en 
un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lampe Bildschirm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geradlinige Ausbreitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anblick</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tela da lâmpada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">propagação rectilinear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">visão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">schermo della lampada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">propagazione rettilinea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ombra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">visione</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ευθύγραμμη διάδοση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σκιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">όραμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
